translations.Rephrase the text to be more formal and: Rephrase the text to be more formal and polite instead of casual.
Make the text easier to understand.
translations.TextProcessing provider using a Large La: TextProcessing provider using a Large Language Model that runs locally on CPU
translations.Machine learning model has been download: Machine learning model has been downloaded successfully.
translations.The machine learning model still needs t: The machine learning model still needs to be downloaded (see below).
translations.Could not execute python. You may need t: Could not execute Python. You may need to set the path to a working executable manually. (See below.)
translations.Background Jobs are not executed via cro: Background Jobs are not executed via cron. This app requires background jobs to be executed via cron.
translations.The app was installed successfully and w: The app was installed successfully and will run prompts in background processes on request.
translations.Choose the machine learning model to be: Choose the machine learning model to be used.
translations.To download the machine learning model,: To download the machine learning model, you need to excecute the occ command line interface of Nextcloud on your server terminal with the following command:
translations.The number of threads to use for inferen: The number of threads to use for inference (more is faster)
translations.Could not execute Python. You may need t: Could not execute Python. You may need to set the path to a working executable manually.
translations.Python executable executed successfully: Python executable executed successfully and setup works.
translations.If Python is not found automatically on: If Python is not found automatically on your system for some reason you can set the path to the Python executable here. If you change this value, make sure to run occ maintenance:repair afterwards.
